sentence: Tillis endorsed Cawthorn's primary challenger Chuck Edwards last month, saying Cawthorn has fallen well short of the most basic standards Western North Carolina expects from their representatives.? Tillis has also previously called for his fellow senator, Richard Burr (R-N.C.), to explain himself to the country over a call Burr made to his brother, who then sold shares in February 2020ahead of the stock market crash caused by the coronavirus pandemic.
author: Anna Kaplan
title: Sen. Tillis Calls For Insider Trading Probe Over Rep. Cawthorn's Ties To Let's Go Brandon' Meme Coin
